website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful arch design canopy bed with elegant textured black finish. Can fit with traditional and contemporary decor alike.
pros: The arch design looks extremely attractive, and is finished with elegant scroll features
The metal frame is strong and sturdy, with a durable textured black powder-coated finish
cons: Some users report receiving their frame slightly damaged

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect and solid. It doesn't make sounds and it was easy to install. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: So I will still give 5 stars altough I did have issues with not receiving all the parts upon initial delivery. Not sure if it was the delivery staff who messed up or company. I received missing parts the following day. I now have to return a new bed which was sent by amazon to replace missing parts. Aside from all off this I love the bed. Great price and great product. It is beautiful and sturdy. Would definetly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter for Christmas and the bed is sturdy and has held up nicely for the past few months. She is small and lightweight but it’s definitely sturdy enough for an adult, although I can’t speak to regular use by an adult. It was reasonably easy to put together and took my husband and i about 45 minutes altogether. The bed looks fabulous and not cheap at all. She says her friends are envious of it, so I guess everyone likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a canopy bed for years, since my mother brought me one years ago, did alot of searching once hubby said if I wanted one get it!:) Found this one king size very affordable,sturdy,and easy to assemble. Only problem was they didn't send all the screws n bolts once hubby and my oldest son started putting it together and it was missing the items. Would have given five stars but for the long delivery wait and missing screws, other than that lovely bed and great price:)
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: This canopy bed frame is beautiful. It arrived in good timing
customer_reviews.text: This canopy bed frame is beautiful. It arrived in good timing, assembly took me close to two hours but that was just me alone, I assume with two people assembly would be much quicker. The frame is sturdy, my only complaint would be that the instructions aren't very clear and one more thing the black paint on this frame is gritty. I like to hang canopy curtains on this but being that the paint is gritty my curtains snag on the bed frame, in my opinion I think the paint on this frame should be a shiny black, overall its a beautiful frame and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Fireredraw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love my bed. Took about an hour to put together myself. Would have been faster with help but I couldn't wait for my husband to get home. Sturdy, no squeaks, my one and two year old grandsons-about 25 lbs each- like to hang from the end bars(not the sides, they will bend if both are on it). Wonderful purchase and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was not hard to put together but it did take well over an hour for me and my boyfriend to put together. It is sturdy, and such a beautiful piece for your bedroom. Family and friends have complimented on this many times. Worth the money, and affordable which is the most important thing!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bed! The rail system came as a different color than ordered so it doesn't match the canopy and I saw that others had issues with that as well and ended up not getting it resolved so I didn't even bother. The paint is easily scratched off so you need to be careful of that as well. It is a sturdy bed and overall my husband and I are happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: *-*Courtney*-*

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: For the price we paid,this bed is beautiful and great. It wasn't the easiest to assemble, but Def not super hard (just a little patience and READ INSTRUCTIONS WELL) . And yes.. It stood up to the adult test lolol
customer_reviews.author: What Matthew Thinks

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful inexpensive bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a year now and it has stayed together through two moves. It's very sleek and minimalist. I have a black canopy that I drape over it and it looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Stogner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for price paid
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were difficult to follow. Item was damaged, warranty says seller is to replace, seller says warranty is to replace. The metal scratches very easily and doesnt feel sturdy. For the price I paid of almost $300 I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hunni Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn’t do it justice. This is an awesome canopy for the price. My 4 year old daughter got our old king size bed and wanted a “princess “ bed. I can’t believe we found a nice one at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Theanie

customer_reviews.title: Thank god I bought the queen size 4 corner post canopy net to go with it cause now it’s looks very nice can’t even tell the poles are missing
customer_reviews.text: I got the queen, them 4 poles that go on Top for canopy were too short, I had to leave them off 🤷🏻‍♀️ However, Thank god I bought the queen size 4 corner post canopy net to go with it cause now it’s looks very nice can’t even tell the poles are missing
customer_reviews.author: Damarylis Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great service fast shipping Live The Bed
customer_reviews.text: Great bed I absolutely love it would buy from seller again fast shipping and great service. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. My son and I had it put together in a half an hour. It's sturdy, looks great and half the price of the other beds I was looking at. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bean

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with no hardware to put the bed together, amazon has been very helpful to make it right, keep in mind if u purchase this bed rails are adjustable twin/full queen/king so don't panic, looks like it will be a beautiful bed
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bed! You’ll need a Box Spring.
customer_reviews.text: Solid Bed! You’ll need a Box Spring. Queen came with textured gray foundation, but will be out of sight so it doesn’t matter. Took me an hour to assemble alone w/ attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Tabanera

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Quick & easy to build, good quality. only thing was that i didn't get the canopy with it. great price for what you get. easy to understand directions. My eight year old daughter and I put this bed together in an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: kortni

customer_reviews.title: great purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 13 year old. She loves it. Sturdy, stylish and was easy to assemble. Full size in black
customer_reviews.author: yosaura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy
customer_reviews.text: Put this to grin less than an hour it’s beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Good price, will last longer then wood & not creak like a wood frames.
customer_reviews.text: Were putting it together & it's Short a screw. Just count how many you have compated to instructions to go buy the one you need before starting it. Delivered sooner then it said with this delay from the quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mustone

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad shipping methods
customer_reviews.text: Came with some damage from shipping but overall quality is superb
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: bed is great, have had it 3 yrs, taken down and moved 4 times with no problems. Price was great, shipping was well packed
customer_reviews.author: darla

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very nice looking. Only thing I don't like is that the foot board and head board are much smaller and shorter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Easy to put together. Make sure u get this one if u want the rails/ bed frame. Other sets do not come with the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lindseyb320

customer_reviews.title: Shipping boxes were open and peace's exposed
customer_reviews.text: The frame is crooked and its not a poster bed like displayed
customer_reviews.author: Goddess ivy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a little difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with this purchase. Somewhat difficult to assemble. I did it by myself and it took about 2 hours. Using the allen wrench that comes with it, my fingers got pretty sore after it was all done. There were a few pieces I had to fight with, but most of the pieces went together fairly well. I love the way it looks - it definitely makes a statement in the room. Mine came with a bed frame, head board, foot board, and the rails for the canopy. I can't wait to buy some curtains for it. Very good quality, and very sturdy. I recommend it, just plan on a little work for the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: findingnemo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Beautiful & sturdy. Overall easy to assemble. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and easy installation. Sturdy construction and nice classic appearance
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and easy installation. Sturdy construction and nice classic appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Pashnyak

customer_reviews.title: like
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bed frame. I found it real easy to assemble. After a while it did start squeaking but just make sure to tighten any loose screws and you'll be set to go for another 1-2 months
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: So there is some good and bad about this. The good, it's affordable, it's surprisingly solid for being the materials it is, it's an attractive bed. The bad, the instructions to put this thing together are AWFUL and I'm mechanically minded so trust me when I say AWFUL. Despite being sturdy, I have to tighten the screws every couple of months or else the bed squeaks. If you don't have a lot of money to spend on a bed go for it, but if you can spend the extra cash you might skip this one and get something a bit nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Sumo_Marri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful easy to assemble canopy bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bed came sooner than I expected. It was in great condition. There wasn't a lot of parts and just one tool. I thought I would have a difficult time, but I didn't. The bed frame was a little tricky, because it can be for a twin or full mattress. Since I had a full mattress, I found the right holes to fit it together. After that, I put the whole bed frame up by myself in less than 2 hours. I am very happy with this bedframe. I got a mattress and it fit perfectly. Then ordered the bedspread and canopy on Amazon. Now I have my dream bed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J Spirk

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly easy to put together and makes no noise. I wanted something romantic and quiet with an old Victorian feel. This bed works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Claypool

customer_reviews.title: A bed for a queen
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. It is very sturdy and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this bed. Easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ash1632

customer_reviews.title: cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I like others, had a hard time putting it together... the directions are not in steps all the way through. the end result is amazing just a pain to put together because of unclear steps! very elegant bed for a great price feels sturdy no complaints on the product itself...
customer_reviews.author: yanintho

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Hubby assembled in about 2 hours with no complaints. My 12 year loves it and gets lots compliments. Very good price on amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: LLlegs

customer_reviews.title: cute for the value
customer_reviews.text: I was cute and easy to put together. It is a good value. It was great for my young teen.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy... Looks great... Meets expectation... Wasn't too hard to assemble, I'm a small female and was able to do it all myself in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Technophobe

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this product because of the price - you get what you pay for BUT this product proved me wrong. Well made, very sturdy and easy to put together (I put it together by myself), and it looks great in my bedroom. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. I got it put together in under 60 minutes. I did need some help with the top bars, and while the bed seems very sturdy and easy to put together, the side bars are fairly flexible and will easily bow under minimal weight (pulling lightly down will cause it to do this).
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Fancy scroll work- Looks like it will last as long as my house does
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, Fancy scroll work- Looks like it will last as long as my house does!
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Damsel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the queen-size version of this bed frame. I just started constructing it, only to find that the cross rails that were shipped are for the king-size version. Now I'm faced with either trying to contact Hillsdale furniture to see if I can exchange parts, or disassembling, re-packaging, and shipping the three large boxes of parts back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Overly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a canopy bed and moving into an apt in a senior community, I figured this was my last chance. This bed has such graceful lines and is truly elegant
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Teapot

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed in a king size for me and my husband. He was worried when I bought it because it was only about $300 and he thought that it would be cheap and flimsy. The bed was delivered 5 days ahead of schedule and he was able to put it together in about an hour. We both love this bed and it is not at all what he thought it would be. It is extremely sturdy and looks very elegant in our master bedroom. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, niece, clean, looks expensive when complimented with black accent. It looks cheap on the photo on this website. It looks strong and niece in person especially with a niece linen set. I went with a Black, White, Red theme for my room although that is really a oriental short of look the bed frame compliments it well. Love the frame, easy to put together and strong frame. Did it by myself without help in 1-2 hours. Direction are bad only photos no written instruction.
customer_reviews.author: naeemah r.

customer_reviews.title: unless you are just that good! So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Get some real tools, and you will need a second set of hands, unless you are just that good! So far so good, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money.
customer_reviews.text: got this bed when it went on sale, construction is pretty good, instruction easy enough for follow, had it together in about 30 min. great way to liven up our bedroom on a budget,
customer_reviews.author: Dr Don

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easier to put together if youhave the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easier to put together if youhave the write tools, recommend an electric impact driver to make it quick!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Not too bad to put together. Just be careful to make sure bolts go in the right holes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed and very easy to assemble. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Romantic
customer_reviews.text: I've had one before and now i have one again and i love it. It shipped pretty quickly and we assembled it without any hassles. It adds romance to our bedroom and when i get the curtains it's gonna be even better. Elaine
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bed- great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her bed! It was odd to put together at first because it does not explain which is the head/foot board but it is easy enough to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Am I wrong or are you??
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed over all, but in the description it said it came with a canopy, I don't know if you mean the bars at the top or and actual sheer canopy, I was very upset that I did not get one with the bed when I opened all of the boxes. on top of that, I, like pretty much everyone else, have trouble putting it together, the instructions weren't to bad but I still think they could have been clarified more.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Russo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I got definitely what I saw on picture. it was little hard to assemble, however I did it by myself (I am women 24 years old) in 5 hours .....and its not heavy if you wanna move ....so I like it but unfortunately it makes my room to look small, even though I got what I want.... btw if some one interesting I am selling mine...
customer_reviews.author: Milana Pary

product_meta.title: Hillsdale Furniture Hillsdale Dover Queen Canopy Bed, Textured Black
product_meta.description: Size:Queen Bed| Color:Textured BlackThis transitional design dover bed set features an exciting scroll design in the headboard and footboard. it textured black powder coat finish in gritty flat black. fully welded construction featuring heavy gauge tubing with 1 1/2-inch round legs and 1-inch round top rail. available in textured black color and queen size. set includes headboard, footboard and canopy. headboard measures 54-1/2-inch height by 61-3/8-inch width. footboard measures 34-inch height by 61-3/8-inch width and canopy is 81-inch height by 61-3/8-inch width.
feature_bullets: Elegant and whimsical Queen Metal Canopy bed with scroll details offset by a simple canopy frame
The simple metal frame features a Textured Black finish
Includes headboard, footboard, canopy kit and bed frame; mattress and box spring required, not included
Forged from heavy gauge tubular steel
Item will ship in three boxes
The touch of a clean, dry cloth is the only care your furniture will ever need
Recommended Weight Limit: 350 lbs. including mattress
Overall Dimensions:80H x 61W x 87L; Footboard Height: 34H; Canopy Height: 80H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
